resources.string:
#1 Application for Pinoy Food Recipe App 
 

No need to carry books for Pinoy Food 
 Recipe. 
 This app enables you to carry basic Food 
 Recipe Cooking Tutorial in your Android 
 Phone. 
 

It contains about 5 Main Pinoy Food 
 Recipes with Image, Description and 
 Procedure. 
 

This app has a very simple user interface 
 and the contents can be easily understood 
 by the users. 
 

This will definitely help you for preparing, 
 for cooking, test, and many more ways. 


 Wherever and whenever you require any 
 information about Cooking you are just 
 click away. 
 
 All the best.....
This is a Multiple Choice quiz so you’ll only have to select your best answer on the given choices. Good luck!!!
This is an Identification quiz so you’ll need to provide your answer on the given space below the question. Good luck!!!
This is the Guess the Recipe quiz so you’ll need to guess the Recipe Name of the Image and write your answer on the given space below the image. Good luck!!!
